note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). All deaths in a country may not have been registered with a [cause of death](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death).
title: Chronic respiratory diseases death rate
subtitle: The reported annual death rate from [chronic respiratory disease](#dod:chronic_respiratory_disease) per 100,000 people, based on the [underlying cause](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death) listed on the death certificate.

display.name: Age-standardized deaths that are from respiratory diseases per 100,000 people, in both sexes aged all ages
